title: As the number of missing people surges, Mexico’s president seeks a recount
description: President Andrés Manuel López Obrador’s pledges to get to the bottom of the country’s worst abuses are collapsing in the face of a powerful military, an inept judicial system and politics.

title: Yevgeniy Prigozhin, Russian mercenary leader who became Putin foe
description: The head of the Wagner Group, he broke with the Russian autocrat in June and attempted a wartime rebellion. He is believed to have died at 62 in a plane crash.

title: Monster hunters descend on Scotland for biggest Loch Ness search in 50 years
description: These monster hunters have drones and a hydrophone. They’re not just people “with binoculars and a tub of sandwiches,” an organizer says.

title: In Ukraine, some see drinking Aperol Spritz as supporting Russia
description: Ukraine is still seeking ways big and small to choke off foreign funding to Russia — in part by shaming companies that continue to work in the country.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Experts say it’s unlikely plane crash was simple accident; Russia recovers black box
description: An investigation into a crashed plane, whose passenger list included Wagner chief Yevgeniy Prigozhin, continues. The Kremlin pushed back on speculation on its role.
